definition: Mt Heng 恆山|恒山[Heng2 Shan1] in Shanxi, one of the Five Sacred Mountains 五嶽|五岳[Wu3 yue4]
high mountain/highest peak of a mountain ridge

sentences.english: Bukak Monastery of Hengshan is rare in the world.
sentences.chinese: 北嶽恆山的懸空寺更是世間罕見。

sentences.english: Of considerably later date (1260) is the main hall of the Pei-yueh Miao, Chuyang, Hopeh.
sentences.chinese: 河北曲陽的北嶽廟的大禮堂建於後來的1260年。
